explains: v. 利用，有益于；有益于
wordGroup: to no avail 无效，完全无用
not avail someone 对某人不起作用
of no avail 无效；不起作用

sentences.en: The doctors tried everything to keep him alive but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 医生千方百计想使他活下来，但无济于事。

sentences.en: I am afraid my eloquence did not avail against the facts.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我的雄辩也无补于事实了。

sentences.en: His efforts were to no avail.
